title: Three Killed in Capitol Heights Shooting, Police Say
body: Three people were killed in a shooting early Saturday in Capitol Heights, Maryland, Prince George’s County Police say.Officers on patrol heard gunshots about 3 a.m. They responded to the 5550 block of Sheriff Road and found a crime scene, police say.Two men were inside a car suffering from gunshot wounds. A woman outside the car had also been shot, police said.News4's Prince George's County Bureau Chief Tracee Wilkins reports.All three were pronounced dead at the scene, police say.Detectives don't believe this was a random crime. Anyone with information is asked to contact Prince George's Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS.
